item.description: {{if .Site.Params.CopyrightHTML}} {{.Site.Params.CopyrightHTML | safeHtml}} yolo {{end}} <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html> Step 1. Install Hugo Go to Hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step. More complete instructions are available at Install Hugo Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has its own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now.
